mapper.delete: DELETE sys_notification_contact,umc_alarm_record_rule FROM umc_alarm_record LEFT JOIN sys_notification_contact ON umc_alarm_record.id=sys_notification_contact.record_id LEFT JOIN umc_alarm_record_rule ON umc_alarm_record.id=umc_alarm_record_rule.record_id WHERE umc_alarm_record.create_time <= #{createTime}

DELETE ci_task_history_instance,ci_task_history_build_command FROM ci_task_history LEFT JOIN ci_task_history_instance ON ci_task_history.id=ci_task_history_instance.task_id LEFT JOIN ci_task_history_build_command ON ci_task_history.id=ci_task_history_build_command.task_id WHERE ci_task_history.create_date <= #{createDate}
